about_the_game:
Action! Adventure! DEATH! (Well, sometimes) Fun! Fear! Rewards! Puzzles! Traps! AND TORCHES!

The FREE demo was updated March 16, 2024 and now gives instant action and access to 9 of the 10 levels!

Moe decided to take a nap in the wrong place and now she's stuck in her own dream. She's a gamer so you can imagine what she's trapped herself with. Can you navigate her through all ten levels to escape the evil eye and wake up? Jump, sprint, run and walk through various traps and obstacles. Use real time reaction to get past truly chaotic dangers. Interact with various puzzles to find the solution. Change from Third to First person anytime. Toggle help on/off for a more immersive experience.
Prepare to delve into a fantasy realm of Moe's mind with puzzles, mazes and platforming like you've never experienced before. Each level is unique with it's own diabolic and twisted traps and they become progressively more difficult.
With NVIDIA DLSS for all RTX cards and Frame Rate Generation for RTX 4 Series cards.

content_descriptors.notes: The player deaths are the only violence. They are varied and specific to certain traps or enemies.

detailed_description:
Action! Adventure! DEATH! (Well, sometimes) Fun! Fear! Rewards! Puzzles! Traps! AND TORCHES!

The FREE demo was updated March 16, 2024 and now gives instant action and access to 9 of the 10 levels!

Moe decided to take a nap in the wrong place and now she's stuck in her own dream. She's a gamer so you can imagine what she's trapped herself with. Can you navigate her through all ten levels to escape the evil eye and wake up? Jump, sprint, run and walk through various traps and obstacles. Use real time reaction to get past truly chaotic dangers. Interact with various puzzles to find the solution. Change from Third to First person anytime. Toggle help on/off for a more immersive experience.
Prepare to delve into a fantasy realm of Moe's mind with puzzles, mazes and platforming like you've never experienced before. Each level is unique with it's own diabolic and twisted traps and they become progressively more difficult.
With NVIDIA DLSS for all RTX cards and Frame Rate Generation for RTX 4 Series cards.
name: Mazemerizzz Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel 5.0 3 GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 64 bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel 5.0 3 GHZ or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 4060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Action! Adventure! DEATH! (Well, sometimes) Fun! Fear! Rewards! Puzzles! Traps! AND TORCHES!
